content:
1. Rahasyam rahasyam-koottarkkumenikkum naathhan kalpichaan
Shishyar medayilarppicho-ree marmmam devaagaare
Sleebaayaal parirakshicha raajasuthan than pesahaayaathu
Innollam-ghoshicheedunnu.

maallika thannil kondaadiya marmmam paaram shreshdhatharam
Shishyanmaare! Bhakshippin-kaasaayum paanam chey/u200bvin
Sabha koodumpolleppozhum ormmayithaaghoshikkenam
Veendum nyaa-naagathanaavollam

Kartthan thirumey-bhaagichoranti-neram sthuthi paadaam
Eerenmaarkkumagamyan than-kaarunyatthaal paaraarnnu.
Tharuvil thante vilaaveennum-durithaharam soppaayaakum
Thiruraktham-neerodu veezhtthukayaal.

Shishyar koodi medayilee nishayil puthranthan meni
Bhaagichu rudhiram chertth-chonnaanenmeyu bhakshippin
Mama raktham paanam chey/u200bvin-vaanavaraajyatthenmesha-
Ykkaagatharaaya- ningallirunneedum.

Ningall sahitham pesahaa bhakshippaan-shishyanmaare! Nyaan
Vaanychhichettam chennothin;- nin veettil pesahaamarmmam
Niravettaan kaamkshikkunnen;-avanappoll nirddeshikkum
Saudhatthil-cheyyuka sannaaham.

Misrem naattil-kunyaattin kolayaal-mukthi janam nedi
Kartthan thanshishyanmaaraam-pantiruvarkkaayu pangkitta
Appam veenyiva nammallude maranatthe jeevippicha
Thanmrthiyin-marmmangall thanne.

Rakshakagaathram-periya kabaraanee-koodaashaapeedham
Appam veenyiva kallarayil - vaykkappetta shareeram thaan
Uththhaanatthaal saatthaane-poraattatthil neritta
Kartthaavi-nnaathmaavaachaaryan

Snehitha shishyasamanvithanaay-moraa-neesho
Aaghoshichaan maallikayil-pesahaayin perunnaall.
/tnyangade vadivil-nararoopam poonda
/tvachanaathmakanaam-kartthaave! Sthothram.
Haaleluyyaa ellaarum-saamodam paadi.
Namme rakshippaan pesahaa-baliyaayittheernna
/thaaleluyyaa-naathhan samsthuthyan.
